column6: FIRST TO LAST The battle fought in two time-periods comes to a climactic conclusion! The X-Men are the only thing that stands between the Evolutionaries and the complete annihilation of the human race.
column8: | editor:Nick Lowe | penciller (cover):Ed McGuinness | penciller:Paco Medina | penciller:Dalibor Talajic | writer:Chris Yost
